function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of housing leading to overcrowding, increasing contact rate and disease transmission","Impact":"Higher risk of disease transmission and spread in overcrowded areas","Mitigation":"Increase access to affordable housing and reduce overcrowding through urban planning and development","Technologies":"Urban planning and development technologies, affordable housing solutions","People":"Vulnerable populations in overcrowded areas","Owner":"Urban planners, housing developers, government agencies"},{"Description":"Lack of clean water access leading to inability to practice proper hygiene and handwashing","Impact":"Increased risk of virus transmission and infection due to poor hygiene practices","Mitigation":"Improve access to clean water and sanitation facilities in underserved areas","Technologies":"Water purification and sanitation technologies","People":"Populations with inadequate access to clean water","Owner":"Government agencies, NGOs, international organizations"},{"Description":"Open defecation and lack of sanitation leading to fecal-oral transmission of pathogens","Impact":"Persistent concern for disease transmission and spread due to poor sanitation practices","Mitigation":"Implement sanitation infrastructure and promote proper sanitation practices to eliminate open defecation","Technologies":"Sanitation infrastructure, waste management solutions","People":"Communities with inadequate sanitation access","Owner":"Local governments, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Inequalities exacerbating the disease burden for vulnerable populations","Impact":"Increased vulnerability and higher disease burden for disadvantaged populations","Mitigation":"Address social inequalities and provide support for vulnerable populations to reduce disease burden","Technologies":"Social support programs, healthcare access initiatives","People":"Disadvantaged and vulnerable populations","Owner":"Government agencies, non-profit organizations"}]}
